rows.label: qst000603_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, there you are! The repairs are all
done and dusted now.

rows.label: qst000603_msg0002
rows.name:
Do it right, fast, and cheap! That's my
motto! It doesn't rhyme or anything.
But it's still a good motto!

rows.label: qst000603_msg0003
rows.name:
Oh! Hello there, Driver! Thanks for
helping me out so much!

rows.label: qst000603_msg0004
rows.name:
He's fixed up that stove so well you'd
think it was brand-new!

rows.label: qst000603_msg0005
rows.name:
Oh, it makes me think of the day my
husband brought it home, it does...

rows.label: qst000603_msg0006
rows.name:
Nice to think that this stove is still going
strong, like our marriage!

rows.label: qst000603_msg0007
rows.name:
Well, my husband's going to be home
soon. So I'd best get cracking on this
pie!

rows.label: qst000603_msg0008
rows.name:
It's a family secret, this pie, y'know.
Passed down through the generations.

rows.label: qst000603_msg0009
rows.name:
Ooh... There I go again... Once I start
talking, I can't stop!

rows.label: qst000603_msg0010
rows.name:
I said I'd give you a little something for
going to all that trouble, didn't I...

rows.label: qst000603_msg0011
rows.name:
I don't think it'll be enough to just let
you have a slice of pie...

rows.label: qst000603_msg0012
rows.name: So I'll give you the recipe!

rows.label: qst000603_msg0013
rows.name:
Now you'll be able to make my fancy
pie any time you like... It's not easy,
mind!
